## BitState type


**Signature:**

```typescript
export type BitState = {
    board: BitBoard;
    turn: Color;
    ep_square: number;
    half_moves: number;
    move_number: number;
    castling: {
        w: {
            k: boolean;
            q: boolean;
        };
        b: {
            k: boolean;
            q: boolean;
        };
    };
};
```
